thread.title: Mary Anne & Joe D'Onofrio
thread.title_full: Premier Lighting, Inc. reviewed by Mary Anne & Joe D'Onofrio

author: Mary Anne & Joe D'Onofrio
title: Mary Anne & Joe D'Onofrio
text:
Premier helped light up our yard and advised me so as to not go over board with too many lights. We wanted to see our statue, sit outdoors on nice evenings and keep away raccoons which seem to love our yard. All worked well. We WILL be having them come back to do more work for our front yard as soon as the season starts in 2017.
The timer works well too.
We absolutely love our yard. Too bad I did not do it when we had our kids living at home. Oh well, now we have it for our adult kids, and grand children and friends --- and us!
